thread.title: Another Excellent Stay at the Roger
thread.title_full: Another Excellent Stay at the Roger - Review of The Roger, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: gabrielt533
title: Another Excellent Stay at the Roger
text: I've stayed at the Roger several times over the past few years and it has become my favorite hotel in Manhattan. The staff is always very friendly (particularly Donna the bartender), the rooms are clean and comfortable, and the location is unbeatable. I couldn't imagine staying anywhere else when I visit New York City.
